com.solarsystem.spaceobjects

Class SpaceObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solarsystem.PointInSpace
      • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.SpaceObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, Moon, Planet, Star

    public abstract class SpaceObject
extends PointInSpace
    This class models a space object. This class provides properties and behaviours relevant for all inheriting child space object classes. A space object is a specialisation of a point in space.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpaceObject

        public SpaceObject(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String colour,
                   double diameter,
                   double distance,
                   double angle,
                   SpaceObject objectOrbiting,
                   double speed)
        Constructor used to initialise member variables for the space object.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the space object.
        colour - The colour of the space object.
        diameter - The diameter of the space object.
        distance - The distance of the object from the point which it orbits.
        angle - The current angle the object is on its orbit path.
        objectOrbiting - The object about which this object orbits.
        speed - The speed of the space object.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(SolarSystem system)
        Method used to draw the space object and the object about which it orbits. This method simplifies the main method when drawing each space object in the loop. By default, all drawn objects move about an orbiting object.
        Parameters:
        system - The solar system to draw objects in.

      • move

        public void move(SolarSystem system)
        Updates the current angle of the space object according to it's speed. Default behaviour for this method is creating a circular orbital path. Sub-classes can choose to override this method for a custom moving implementation.
        Parameters:
        system - The solar system to draw the object in.

      • getObjectOrbiting

        public SpaceObject getObjectOrbiting()
        Returns the space object that the object is orbiting.
        Returns:
        The orbiting space object instance.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the space object.
        Returns:
        The space object's name.

      • getColour

        public java.lang.String getColour()
        Returns the colour of the space object.

        The space object's colour.

      • getDiameter

        public double getDiameter()
        Returns the diameter of the space object.
        Returns:
        The space object's diameter.

      • setDiameter

        public void setDiameter(double diameter)
        Sets the diameter of the space object.
        Parameters:
        diameter - The new diameter of the space object.

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        Returns the space object's speed.
        Returns:
        The speed of the object.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the speed of the space object.
        Parameters:
